results.title: [A report of successful management with simvastatin plus ezetimibe in alopecia areata].
results.text_hl: We report a case of a 23 years-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Alopecia_Areata</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000506 @@@alopecia areata@@@ successfully treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin/ezetimibe@@@.

citations.NLM: Arellano J, Carrasco C, García C. [A report of successful management with simvastatin plus ezetimibe in alopecia areata]. Medwave. 2020 Nov 2;20(9):e8053. PMID: 33231574
